bibl.title: The Dramatic Function of 'Speaking Back into the House' in Menander's Dyskolos.
bibl.note: Revised and enlarged version of a paper delivered in a conference on Greek and Roman comedy held by the School of Classics, University of Leeds on 18-19 November 2000 in honour of Professor Geoffrey Arnott. - Also published electronically (including an abstract and English translations of passages in Greek and Latin) in: Greek and Roman Comedy: Essays in Honour of W.G. Arnott = Leeds International Classical Studies 3 (2003/2004) 21 pp.
bibl.seg: ZAGAGI Netta, The Dramatic Function of 'Speaking Back into the House' in Menander's Dyskolos.

Revised and enlarged version of a paper delivered in a conference on Greek and Roman comedy held by the School of Classics, University of Leeds on 18-19 November 2000 in honour of Professor Geoffrey Arnott. - Also published electronically (including an abstract and English translations of passages in Greek and Latin) in: Greek and Roman Comedy: Essays in Honour of W.G. Arnott = Leeds International Classical Studies 3 (2003/2004) 21 pp.
